getHttpSession

public static javax.servlet.http.HttpSession getHttpSession()

getDomainFacade

public static DomainFacade getDomainFacade(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
This method gets the DomainFacade from web session, if not found it will get it form JDNI. Returns DomainFacade if found. Returns null if DomainFacade is not found.

Returns:
